Headline: #66 Chicago Temporary Reroute at Chicago/Cicero
ShortDescription: #66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Central, Augusta, Austin and Chicago, due to a Marathon near Chicago/Cicero.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#66 Chicago buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Chicago, Central, Augusta, Austin and Chicago, then resume their normal route: due to a Marathon near Chicago/Cicero. 

Allow extra travel time.

Revised
